alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Goodhue County through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wanamingo, or 17 miles north of Mantorville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Zumbrota around 455 PM CDT. Goodhue around 505 PM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 94 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
